meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for bolivares at the bank.
meanings.sent2: In Venezuela, people use bolivares to buy goods and services.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat and made it rain bolivares!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shower of bolivares, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bolivares jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Venezuela.
meanings.sent1: The price of the item was listed in bolivares on the menu.
meanings.sent2: She counted her bolivares carefully before heading to the market.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel saved up acorns to trade for shiny bolivares.
meanings.sent4: His words were like bolivares, valuable and carefully chosen.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with golden bolivares.
